alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 9:28PM EDT until April 17 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 828 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over I65 And AL 225, or 4 miles northwest of Bay Minette, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bay Minette, Century, Flomaton, Stockton, Molino, I65 And AL 225 and Bratt. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
